item.title: JPMorgan to build new London headquarters in Canary Wharf
item.description: "This building will represent our lasting commitment to the city, the UK" and its staff, said JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon.

item.title: The world’s top designers are exploring whether the private sector can move the needle on the UN’s SDGs
item.description: “Every time you design something, you're making an active choice on the future you want to build,” says Ben Sheppard, founder of Design for Good.

item.title: Science Says Practice Thanksgiving Every Day If You Want to Be Happier, Healthier, and Less Stressed
item.description: The scientific research is clear: A daily or weekly gratitude practice reduces stress and increases well-being.

item.title: Sorry, mom. The shopping bots suggested a bathrobe for Christmas
item.description: Bloomberg asked several AI bots — including Amazon’s Rufus, OpenAI’s ChatGPT and Walmart Inc.’s Sparky — what to buy mom for Christmas.

item.title: Once Upon a Time, He Was the NFL’s ‘Dirtiest’ Player. Now, He’s Teaching Lessons in Emotional Intelligence
